w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Icon
w:HTMLPanel.p: PWT privides a bunch of icons based on fontello's (http://fontello.com). Those icons are webfonts so easily resizeable.
w:HTMLPanel.w:Heading: Basic usage
w:HTMLPanel.p: Set the icon with the type attribute referencing the IconType enumeration.
The icon color can be customize with the color attribute. As the icon are webfonts, the color use the text-* CSS classe.s

c:StaticCode.pre: <w:Icon type="OK" color="SUCCESS"/> <w:Icon type="CANCEL" color="DANGER"/> <w:Icon type="PLUS" color="INFO"/> <w:Icon type="MINUS" color="WARNING"/> <w:Icon type="LEFT_OPEN" color="MUTED"/> <w:Icon type="RIGHT_OPEN" color="DEFAULT"/> <w:Icon type="UP_OPEN" /> <w:Icon type="DOWN_OPEN" /> <w:Icon type="ANDROID" /> <w:Icon type="BITBUCKET" /> <w:Icon type="GITHUB" /> <w:Icon type="CALENDAR" /> <w:Icon type="FEMALE" /> <w:Icon type="MALE" /> <w:Icon type="INFO" />
